attributes.action: Help candidates caught up in property professionals mess.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have been caught up in this mess and left with £10235 worth of debt for remorgageing my house to better myself
in terms of employment, and like many others have found myself in deep trouble financially and tremendous amount of stress please help us all concerned.

rejection.details: To ensure support for petitions is not split, we try to avoid duplication wherever possible. You may wish to sign the current petition on this subject at http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Help-PP-trainees/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
